description:
if neutron has port binding extension, 

the port client should be an admin user, which should be a different client with neutron.

check this link

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/unit/network/test_neutronv2.py#L375-L379

line 376 and 379 should use difference mock client object.
title: neutronv2 api unit test case error

comments.content:

comments.content: This doesn't appear to have anything to do with Oslo.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bnemec

comments.content: Can you explain what this is failing to do correctly? In the current state the bug is a bit hard to understand.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
hi Sean,
sorry for the confusing,
if you see.
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/network/neutronv2/api.py#L405-L412

port_client and neutron are actually difference things if we have port binding extension.
but in test cases, https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/unit/network/test_neutronv2.py#L375-L379
we mox some thing, this will lead test case error , one of the case is my another patch https://review.openstack.org/#/c/156112/

thanks Eli.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~taget-9
